lines.gurmukhi: Awpdw ADIn jYsy duKq duhwgn kau shij suhwg n suhwgn ko BwveI
lines.transliteration_english: Aapadaa Adheen Jaisay Doukhat Duhaagan Kau , Sahaji Suhaag N Suhaagan Ko Bhaavaee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a distressed, divorced woman cannot bear to see or tolerate the loving and happy union of another woman with her husband,

lines.gurmukhi: ibrhnI ibrh ibEg mY sMjogin ko suMdr isMgwir AiDkwru n suhwveI
lines.transliteration_english: Birahanee Birah Biaog Mai Sanjogani Ko , Soundar Singaari Adhikaaru N Suhaavaee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a woman separated from her husband and bearing the pangs of separation cannot tolerate the embellishments of another woman who is united with her husband,

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy qn mwNiJ bwNiJ rog sog sMso sRm sauq ky suqih pyiK mhwN duK pwveI
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Tan Maanjhi Baanjhi Rog Sog Sanso Srama , Saout Kay Soutahi Paykhi Mahaan Doukh Paavaee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a distressed and fatigued woman suffering from her inability to bear a child feels much distressed on seeing the son of her co-wife,

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy pr qn Dn dUKn qiRdoK mm swDn ko sukRq n ihrdY ihqwveI ]513]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Par Tan Dhan Dookhan Tridokh Mama , Saadhan Ko Soukrat N Hiradai Hitaavaee ?513?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly I am infested with three chronic ailments-namely other's women, other's wealth and slander. And that is why praise of the devoted and loving Sikhs of the True Guru does not please me.  (513)
